About

I'm an 18 year old student living in South East of the good ol' United Kingdom. I design and develop websites for 5 Lines Creative, a design studio which I co-founded. I am in the final year of education - I attend a Sixth Form College in Hampshire, studying Maths, History, Chemistry and Biology. I am planning on going to University in September 2013 to study Software Engineering.
